ReturnPolicy.Description:
Please read all of the section below before buy/bit our listing item.
We consider that all of buyers who purchased our items have agreed to them.
 
1. If you don't like the item or find some significant difference between the actual item and descriptions/pictures, please contact us within 14 days after handing.
    We will reply within 24 hours, except for Saturday and Sunday.

2. Please don't open the case without contact to us.
    We don't accept the return request through the case.

3. We have not listed any fake items as described on all of our listing item.
    So, we do not accept the reason of the return that It's counterfeit or fake.

4. The Japanese cellar such as us does not apply hassle-free returns.
    We won’t able to issue return label from eBay.
    In the case of returns, please don't forget to put the shipping label that we put on your luggage in return package.

5. If we find some traces of use by buyers on the return item, we will make reduction from the refund amount.

Note -About Descriptions and Pictures- Item"s size is measured by ourselves, so a slight difference may occur between our measurements and the official sizes on the official websites. We try to take pictures of all defects , but we cannot cover all of minor dameges. Please understand our items is sold as is. We check smells for all items.We do not sell any items with strong smells. However, Some used items may have slightly an unpleasant odor. If you are very sensitive to smells, please do not make a bid. The photograph may not show exact color of item, due to different PC displays and lighting conditions. Also, because of used articles, most of bags are somewhat deformed. Please be aware that a bag is formed better by putting something inside when the photograph is taken. -Return/Refund/Cancellation Policies- Please make sure to take a look, and agree to following our return policies before your purchase. We will accept returns if you contact us within 14 days. Buyers need to return the goods in the same conditions as when it was received.And you need to pay return shipping. We will refund your money after receiving the item. We sell our items on other websites and in our retail stores in Japan at the same time. If the item was sold out before your purchase, your order will be cancelled and a full refund will be issued immediately.
